words.ex: The old castle had a labyrinthine network of corridors.
The team delivered a lackluster performance in the finals.
Many citizens lamented the loss of historic buildings.
The ruling was a landmark decision in environmental law.
She gave a languid wave from the hammock.
The project languished due to lack of funding.
A brief lapse in concentration caused the error.
The charity relied on the largesse of private donors.
The disease can remain latent for years.
Her efforts to improve education are truly laudable.
They hosted a lavish celebration for their anniversary.
He felt lethargic after the long flight.
She added a touch of levity to the serious discussion.
His lack of experience became a liability for the team.
The new technology aims to liberate workers from repetitive tasks.
He expressed strong libertarian views on government control.
The novel was criticized for its licentious themes.
She stepped into the limelight after her breakthrough role.
He walked with a slight limp after the injury.
The scent of flowers lingered in the air.
The media began to lionize the young athlete.
The company was forced to liquidate its assets.

He recited a litany of complaints about the system.
The dancer moved with lithe elegance.
He was livid when he heard about the mistake.
She was loath to admit she was wrong.
He absolutely loathes early morning meetings.

They set lofty goals for the upcoming year.

A major deadline looms on the horizon.

The accusation was so ludicrous that no one believed it.

Danger seemed to lurk around every corner.
